metadata.synopsis: If Marrow of Mercy is thrown in the burning Circle of Pearls while Vanra is still alive inside the hag, the hag will vomit her out in this dialogue
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Don't kill the hag beforehand!2. Use Scroll of Burning Pearls on the Circle of Pearls, it will start burning3. When the Circle of Pearls is burning, you need to throw Marrow of Mercy in it. At least one party member needs to be nearby the hag at the moment to witness the dialogue

1.speaker: Auntie Ethel
1.text: What did you - hurk. Stay down, Vanra  - URGH.
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gagging and wretching - trying to stop herself from puking. Hands over mouth at end of line.NodeContext: Gagging and wretching - trying to stop herself from puking. Hands over mouth at end of line.

5.speaker: Player
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands over mouth at start of line. Vomits loudly and disgustingly (shot from behind). Hunched over heavily.NodeContext: Hands over mouth at start of line. Vomits loudly and disgustingly (shot from behind). Hunched over heavily.

3.speaker: Auntie Ethel
3.text: MAYRINA? She did this to - BLEUGH.
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands over mouth at start of line. Vomits loudly and disgustingly (shot from behind). Hunched over heavily.NodeContext: Hands over mouth at start of line. Vomits loudly and disgustingly (shot from behind). Hunched over heavily.

7.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands over mouth at start of line. Vomits loudly and disgustingly (shot from behind). Hunched over heavily.NodeContext: Hands over mouth at start of line. Vomits loudly and disgustingly (shot from behind). Hunched over heavily.

8.speaker: Player
8.text: That's it - cough her up, hag.

6.speaker: Auntie Ethel
6.text: ARGH. YOU COST ME A FRESH YOUNG HAG! I'M GOING TO PAINT THE WALL WITH YOUR GUTS YOU LITTLE SHITSTAIN.
